content: I think I'll go with the roasted vegetables. I have some bell peppers and zucchini in the fridge that need to be used up. Do you have a simple recipe for roasting them? And, by the way, I want to make sure I have enough time to cook and eat dinner before watching my episode of "The Office" and getting to bed on time. Can you give me a rough estimate of how long it'll take to roast the vegetables?
